author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
summary: ...SONIA HOLDING STEADY WHILE MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD... As of 2:00 AM PDT Mon Oct 27 the center of Sonia was located near 14.2, -120.6 with movement WNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...SONIA HOLDING STEADY WHILE MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD... As of 2:00 AM PDT Mon Oct 27 the center of Sonia was located near 14.2, -120.6 with movement WNW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Sonia (EP3/EP182025)
